titles.title: A resolution commemorating the success of Team USA in the past 22 Olympic Winter Games and supporting Team USA in the 2014 Olympic Winter Games and Paralympic Winter Games.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
2/6/2014--Passed Senate without amendment. Expresses support for: (1) the athletes of Team USA at the 2014 Olympic Winter and Paralympic Winter Games in Sochi, Russia; and (2) the goals and ideals of the Games.
Applauds all athletes and coaches of Team USA and their families.
Thanks the U.S. Olympic Committee for its unwavering support of Team USA.
